title: What are Some Historical Works and Discoveries on Animal Magnetism?
first_phrase: This text offers an insight into the history of animal magnetism, also known as mesmerism, a concept that has fascinated people since the 18th century. It includes works by renowned authors, including Joseph Gardane, J.-P.-F. Deleuze, and Alfred Binet. In the last 200 tokens, it features a memoir by F.A. about magnetism and hypnotism, which provides additional information on these phenomena. The memoir also discusses the observed phenomena during induced nervous sleep.
